original_text: When my own mind returned to me, I also received my authority again as king. People respected me as a great king again. My officers and important men came back to work with me. I ruled again over my kingdom. I became even greater than I was before. When my own mind returned to me, I also received my authority again as king. People respected me as a great king again. My officers and important men came back to work with me. I ruled again over my kingdom. I became even greater than I was before.
korean_text: 그 때에 내 총명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 내 나라의 영광에 대하여도 내 위엄과 광명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 나의 모사들과 관원들이 내게 찾아오니 내가 내 나라에서 다시 세움을 받고 또 지극한 위세가 내게 더하였느니라

sentences.original_text: When my own mind returned to me
I also received my authority again as king
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또 다시 왕으로서의 권위를 되찾았다

sentences.original_text: People respected me as a great king again
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 나를 위대한 왕으로 다시 존중했다

sentences.original_text: My officers and important men came back
I ruled again over my kingdom
I became even greater than I was before
When my own mind returned to me
I also received my authority again as king

I ruled again over my kingdom
I became even greater than I was before
